name: MonkeyMath-FunMathPractice
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: monkey math
des:
Monkey Math - A fun Math practice
This unique skill provides real world math word problems in interesting and fun way, and enable kids to understand and apply their math knowledge in the real life. The skill has different categories and levels of difficulty (easy, medium or hard) for children of different ages.
The skill introduces a monkey character Boo boo to make it engaging for the children and also rewards them as they answer correctly.
There are also, different medals you get as you collect more bananas as rewards. 
There are categories available are addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, times table, greater or lesser, place value.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
